messages.message:
Brian
Hey, just wanted to remind everyone the movie is at 7:00, tonight.  I live here: http://maps.google.com/maps?q=9259+E+Raintree+Dr+%232164,+Scottsdale,+AZ+85260&hl=en&ll=33.618035,-111.880544&spn=0.001814,0.003559&sll=35.647085,-118.66915&sspn=14.4811,29.157715&vpsrc=6&hnear=9259+E+Raintree+Dr,+Scottsdale,+Arizona+85260&t=m&z=19
We can meet beforehand at my place and pregame.  I will probably bring flasks with gin and whiskey.
I recommend that we meet at the theater at 6:30 so we can order food before the movie start.  I got us the seats with service and free popcorn.  The theater is here:
http://maps.google.com/maps?q=ipic+scottsdale&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&fb=1&gl=us&hq=ipic&hnear=0x872b08d9a7772c97:0x26d2e412188fe618,Scottsdale,+AZ&cid=0,0,6244553174479293305&t=m&z=16&vpsrc=0&iwloc=A
http://maps.google.com/maps?q=9259+E+Raintree+Dr+#2164,+Scottsdale,+AZ+85260&hl=en&ll=33.618035,-111
maps.google.com

Jennifer
I'll be able to make it to the theatre by 6:30. I can't really get out much earlier.

Facebook User
Same here drew has a dr appointment but kuddos on the flask I like the idea
